Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to enhance your daily routine. With its unique features and high-quality materials, it's designed to provide exceptional value and convenience. Considering its craftsmanship and benefits, I believe it's worth more than its face value. I am offering it to you for $120. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the time and effort put into creating something truly special. I trust you'll find immense value in it. Looking forward to your response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
